meanings.definition: A wild hog with a prominent ridge of raised hairs along its back.
meanings.sent1: The razorbacks roamed freely in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of razorbacks while hiking in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The razorbacks decided to have a dance party in the mud.
meanings.sent4: The razorbacks stood out in the field like a row of spiky soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The image of the razorbacks with their raised hairs was etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: The athletic teams of the University of Arkansas.
meanings.sent1: The razorbacks won the championship game last night.
meanings.sent2: Fans cheered loudly for the razorbacks at the stadium.
meanings.sent3: The razorbacks surprised everyone by playing basketball in tutus.
meanings.sent4: The razorbacks fought hard on the field like warriors in battle.
meanings.sent5: The razorbacks' victory celebration was filled with joy and pride.
